title: Future Memories
description: Future Memories is a digital studio where strategic design and technology unite into products of tomorrow.

title: Future Memories - Bauer University
description: Gamification-based online training platform. Turns worldwide retailers into Bauer hockey gear experts.

title: Future Memories - Mat.se
description: A modern logistics and supply chain platform to get fresh food delivered to your door.

title: Future Memories - proFLIGHT
description: An iPad app for commercial aircraft pilots. Delivers wind conditions and weather alerts right into the flight deck.

title: Future Memories - Picular
description: A rocket fast primary color generator using Google's image search.

title: Future Memories - SleepCure
description: SleepCure is a digital analysis and treatment method for people who want to sleep better.

title: Future Memories - Retts Plus
description: Saving lives by supporting emergency personnel in critical decision-making during medical emergency situations.

title: Future Memories - AntiStress
description: A pocket diary to track stress levels and listen to meditative soundtracks in order to reduce stress.

title: Future Memories - Tennis Watch
description: The first tennis app designed for Apple Watch. It turns your watch into a simple score tracking device.

title: Future Memories - Paykartan
description: Leave your wallet at home. A digital service highlighting all places in town that accept mobile payments.
